Package db

Interface Summary
Updater.Listener The Updater invokes the listener object when something is changed in the database, if a listener is set.
 

Class Summary
Database The Database class implements a database and provides API methods to add, modify, search, export and import.
FileItem Class to represent a file element and allows converting between this and XML objects so that XML Node can be used in Database API.
FileUtil A helper class for file related functions.
GlobMatch This is a utility function borrowed from else where to perform the glob-style pattern matching.
LocalDir Implements the LocalDir data class that stores the user name, local directory and device name.
MyReadWriteLock The read-write lock similar to the ReadWriteLock interface.
Updater Implements the updater thread with 10 seconds interval.
